summary: A HD Torch Texture for Winter
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PmOScCN.jpg[/IMG]
[SIZE=3]I travel a lot in Skyrim and come across a lot of Snowy Regions ! When its Dusk or Dawn I want to use my Torch to brighten up my Environment. When I enter Caves I want to Equip my Torch to make light and warm myself up. But no Torch Texture made me Satisfied that fits into the Winter of Skyrim. So I decided to make a new Torch Texture for Winter. [/SIZE]

[COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=2][SIZE=4]The Texutres come in 2 Versions[/SIZE].[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=5]2048x2048 HD[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]or[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#00B0F0]1024x1024 HD[/COLOR][/SIZE]



[SIZE=4]Enjoy another new Torch !

[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#00B0F0][SIZE=3]HXP[/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=3]
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]How to Install :
First choose your Resolution and then simply drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Main Directory. Overwrite Files if you get asked !
[/SIZE]
